type: Tableau de bord de projet public
short_summary: Améliorations de port Berens River - Sigurdsson Island, Manitoba.
description: Le projet consiste en l’obtention d’un marché public pour les services de construction navale. Le marché sera réservé aux entreprises autochtones. La gestion du projet sera managée par les FPARC, et la notion de coût sera imposée
duration_in_months: It will take around 33 months to complete the construction in accordance with the specifications and the estimated schedule
full_summary:
### Harbour Improvements Project
#### Berens River, Sigurdsson Island, Manitoba
#### Solicitation Reference Number: 30004622
#### Amendment Number: 4
#### Publication Date: August 10, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: September 5, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Daylight Time)
#### Amendment Date: September 5, 2023

The **Harbour Improvements – Berens River – Sigurdsson Island** project entails the construction of a new 45-pad pre-cast concrete launch ramp, including the demolition of the existing ramp. The scope also includes harbour repairs at the Sigurdsson Island harbour site, including timber fender installation, ladder installation, and timber cribwork repair.

#### Procurement Details
##### Procurement Category: CNST
##### Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
##### Selection Criteria: Lowest price

This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. For more information on Indigenous business requirements, see Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual.

Additional details:

* **UNSPSC Code:** 72141200 (Marine construction services)
* **Trade Agreements:** None
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Manitoba
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, NB E3C 2M6

**Contact Information:**
* **Contact Name:** Marie-France Chrétien
* **Contact Email:** [marie-france.chretien@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:marie-france.chretien@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone:** (450) 521-4448

For access to tender documents and more information, please visit [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).
